summary.span: 对一个值执行求反并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Negates a value and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6565|negneg|对当前位于堆栈顶部的值求反。Negates the value currently on top of the stack.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 将值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出一个值并对其进行求反。A value is popped from the stack and negated. 3. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `neg`指令对值进行求反并将结果推送到堆栈顶部。The `neg` instruction negates value and pushes the result on top of the stack. 返回类型与操作数类型相同。The return type is the same as the operand type. 整数值的求反是标准2的补码反运算。Negation of integral values is standard two's complement negation. 特别是，取消最多 (该负数不包含正值) 会产生最大的负数。In particular, negating the most negative number (which does not have a positive counterpart) yields the most negative number. 若要检测此溢出 ，请改用指令 (即从 0) 中减去。To detect this overflow use the instruction instead (that is, subtract from 0). 取消浮点数不能溢出，取消 NaN 返回 NaN。Negating a floating-point number cannot overflow, and negating NaN returns NaN. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `neg` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `neg` opcode: -

summary.span: 将对新的从零开始的一维数组（其元素属于特定类型）的对象引用推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes an object reference to a new zero-based, one-dimensional array whose elements are of a specific type onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8 D < `T` >8D < `T` >|newarr `etype`newarr `etype`|创建具有类型的元素的新数组 `etype` 。Creates a new array with elements of type `etype`.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 数组中的元素数被推送到堆栈上。The number of elements in the array is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出元素数并创建数组。The number of elements is popped from the stack and the array is created. 3. 对新数组的对象引用被推送到堆栈上。An object reference to the new array is pushed onto the stack. `newarr`指令将对象引用推送 (类型 `O`) 到一个新的从零开始的一维数组，该数组的元素类型 `etype` (用于描述类型) 的元数据标记。The `newarr` instruction pushes an object reference (type `O`) to a new zero-based, one-dimensional array whose elements are of type `etype` (a metadata token describing the type). 新数组中的元素数应指定为 `native int` 。The number of elements in the new array should be specified as a `native int`. 有效的数组索引范围从零到最大元素数减一。Valid array indexes range from zero to the maximum number of elements minus one. 数组元素可以是任何类型，包括值类型。The elements of an array can be any type, including value types. 从零开始的一维数组，使用引用适当的值类型的元数据标记 （ (的) ）创建。Zero-based, one-dimensional arrays of numbers are created using a metadata token referencing the appropriate value type (, and so on). 数组的元素初始化为适当类型的0。Elements of the array are initialized to 0 of the appropriate type. 使用而不是创建从零开始的一维数组和多维数组 `newarr` 。Nonzero-based one-dimensional arrays and multidimensional arrays are created using rather than `newarr`. 通常，它们是使用 .NET Framework 中的类的方法创建的 。More commonly, they are created using the methods of the class in the .NET Framework. 如果内存不足，无法满足请求，则会引发。 is thrown if there is insufficient memory to satisfy the request. `numElems`小于0时引发。 is thrown if `numElems` is less than 0. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `newarr` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `newarr` opcode: -

Public Shared ReadOnly Newobj As OpCode

summary.span: 创建一个值类型的新对象或新实例，并将对象引用（ 类型）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Creates a new object or a new instance of a value type, pushing an object reference (type ) onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |73 < `T` >73 < `T` >|newobj `ctor`newobj `ctor`|分配未初始化的对象或值类型，并调用构造函数方法 `ctor` 。Allocates an uninitialized object or value type and calls the constructor method `ctor`.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 自变量按 `arg1` `argn` 顺序推送到堆栈上。Arguments `arg1` through `argn` are pushed on the stack in sequence. 2. `argn`通过 `arg1` 从堆栈中弹出并将参数传递给来 `ctor` 创建对象。Arguments `argn` through `arg1` are popped from the stack and passed to `ctor` for object creation. 3. 对新的对象的引用被推送到堆栈上。A reference to the new object is pushed onto the stack. `newobj`指令创建新的对象或值类型的新实例。The `newobj` instruction creates a new object or a new instance of a value type. `Ctor` 是 (的元数据标记 `methodref` ， `methoddef` 必须标记为构造函数) ，指示要调用的构造函数的名称、类和签名。`Ctor` is a metadata token (a `methodref` or `methoddef` that must be marked as a constructor) that indicates the name, class and signature of the constructor to call. `newobj`指令分配与相关联的类的新实例 `ctor` ，并根据需要将新实例中的所有字段初始化为 0 (的正确类型) 或空引用。The `newobj` instruction allocates a new instance of the class associated with `ctor` and initializes all the fields in the new instance to 0 (of the proper type) or null references as appropriate. 然后，它将调用 `ctor` 具有给定参数的构造函数和新创建的实例。It then calls the constructor `ctor` with the given arguments along with the newly created instance. 调用构造函数后，在堆栈上推送 (类型) 的已初始化对象引用 `O` 。After the constructor has been called, the now initialized object reference (type `O`) is pushed on the stack. 从构造函数的角度来看，未初始化的对象是参数0，传递给 newobj 的其他参数按照顺序排列。From the constructor's point of view, the uninitialized object is argument 0 and the other arguments passed to newobj follow in order. 使用而不是创建所有从零开始的一维数组 `newobj` 。All zero-based, one-dimensional arrays are created using , not `newobj`. 另一方面，所有其他数组 (多个维度，或者使用创建一维但非基于零的) `newobj` 。On the other hand, all other arrays (more than one dimension, or one-dimensional but not zero-based) are created using `newobj`. 通常不使用创建值类型 `newobj` 。Value types are not usually created using `newobj`. 它们通常作为参数或局部变量分配，使用 `newarr` (用于从零开始的一维数组) ，或作为对象的字段。They are usually allocated either as arguments or local variables, using `newarr` (for zero-based, one-dimensional arrays), or as fields of objects. 分配后，将使用对其进行初始化 。Once allocated, they are initialized using . 但是， `newobj` 可以使用指令在堆栈上创建值类型的新实例，然后可以将该实例作为参数进行传递，并将其存储在本地，依此类推。However, the `newobj` instruction can be used to create a new instance of a value type on the stack, that can then be passed as an argument, stored in a local, and so on. 如果内存不足，无法满足请求，则会引发。 is thrown if there is insufficient memory to satisfy the request. 如果 `ctor` 找不到具有指定名称、类和签名的构造函数方法，则会引发。 is thrown if a constructor method `ctor` with the indicated name, class and signature could not be found. 当 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码而不是运行时，通常会检测到此情况。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, rather than at runtime. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `newobj` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `newobj` opcode: -

span.span: No meaningful operation is performed although a processing cycle can be consumed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0000|nopnop|执行不具有行为的操作。Performs an operation without behavior.| 没有为此指令定义堆栈过渡行为。There is no stack transitional behavior defined for this instruction. `nop`操作不执行任何操作。The `nop` operation does nothing. 它用于在对操作码进行修补时填充空间。It is intended to fill in space if opcodes are patched. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `nop` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `nop` opcode: -

summary.span: 计算堆栈顶部整数值的按位求补并将结果作为相同的类型推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Computes the bitwise complement of the integer value on top of the stack and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack as the same type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6666|notnot|计算值的按位求补。Computes the bitwise complement of a value.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 被推送到堆栈上。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 从堆栈中弹出，并计算按位求补。`value` is popped from the stack and its bitwise complement computed. 3. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `not`指令计算整数值的按位求补并将结果推送到堆栈上。The `not` instruction computes the bitwise complement of an integer value and pushes the result onto the stack. 返回类型与操作数类型相同。The return type is the same as the operand type. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `not` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `not` opcode: -

span.span: Compute the bitwise complement of the two integer values on top of the stack and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6060|或or|计算两个整数值的按位 "或"，返回整数。Computes the bitwise OR of two integer values, returns an integer.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 被推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 被推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和 `value1` 从堆栈中弹出，并按位或计算。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and their bitwise OR computed. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `or`指令计算堆栈顶部的两个值的按位 "或"，并将结果推送到堆栈上。The `or` instruction computes the bitwise OR of two values atop the stack, pushing the result onto the stack. `Or` 是特定于整数的操作。`Or` is an integer-specific operation. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `or` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `or` opcode: -

summary.span: 指定后面的数组地址操作在运行时不执行类型检查，并且返回可变性受限的托管指针。

span.span: Specifies that the subsequent array address operation performs no type check at run time, and that it returns a managed pointer whose mutability is restricted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1EFE 1E|readonly。readonly.|指定后续数组地址操作在运行时不执行类型检查，并且它返回具有受限可变性的托管指针。Specify that the subsequent array address operation performs no type check at run time, and that it returns a managed pointer with restricted mutability.| 此前缀只能出现在 `ldelema` 指令之前，并调用数组的特殊 `Address` 方法。This prefix can only appear immediately preceding the `ldelema` instruction and calls to the special `Address` method on arrays. 其对后续操作的影响是双重的：Its effect on the subsequent operation is twofold: 1. 在运行时，不执行任何类型检查操作。At run time, no type check operation is performed. 请注意，在 `ldelema` `stelem` 引用类型数组上使用时，通常会对和说明进行隐式类型检查。Note that there is normally an implicit type check for the `ldelema` and `stelem` instructions when used on reference type arrays. 没有值类的运行时类型检查，因此 `readonly` 在这种情况下，不会执行任何操作。There is never a run-time type check for value classes, so `readonly` is a no-op in that case. 2. 验证程序将操作地址操作的结果视为具有受限可变性的托管指针。The verifier treats the result of the address-of operation as a managed pointer with restricted mutability. 指针被称为具有受限的可变性，因为定义类型控制值是否可转变。The pointer is said to have restricted mutability because the defining type controls whether the value can be mutated. 对于不公开用于就地更新值的公共字段或方法的值类，该指针为只读 (因此前缀) 的名称。For value classes that expose no public fields or methods that update the value in place, the pointer is read-only (hence the name of the prefix). 特别是，表示基元类型的类 (例如，System.object) 不公开赋值函数，因此是只读的。In particular, the classes representing primitive types (for example, System.Int32) do not expose mutators and thus are read-only. 以这种方式限制的托管指针只能通过以下方式使用：A managed pointer restricted in this fashion can be used only in the following ways: - 为、、、 `object` `ldfld` `ldflda` `stfld` `call` 或 `constrained callvirt` 指令的参数。As the `object` parameter for the `ldfld`, `ldflda`, `stfld`, `call`, or`constrained callvirt` instructions. - 作为 `pointer` 指令的参数或指令的参数 `ldobj` 之一 `ldind` 。As the `pointer` parameter to the `ldobj` instruction or to one of the `ldind` instructions. - 作为 `source` 指令的参数 `cpobj` 。As the `source` parameter to the `cpobj` instruction. 不允许所有其他操作，包括 `stobj` 、 `initobj` 、或 `mkrefany` 操作，或者任何 `stind` 说明。All other operations disallowed, including the `stobj`, `initobj`, or `mkrefany` operations, or any of the `stind` instructions. 前缀的用途 `readonly` 是在从泛型代码中的数组获取元素时避免类型检查。The purpose of the `readonly` prefix is to avoid a type check when fetching an element from an array in generic code. 例如， `arr[i].m()` 如果数组的元素类型 `arr` 是一个已被约束为具有方法的接口的泛型类型，则该表达式 `m` 可能会编译为以下 MSIL。For example, the expression `arr[i].m()`, where the element type of the array `arr` is a generic type that has been constrained to have an interface with method `m`, might compile to the following MSIL. ``` ldloc arr ldloc i readonly. ldelema !0 // Loads the pointer to the object. … // Load the arguments to the call. constrained. !0 callvirt m ``` 如果没有 `readonly` 前缀，则 `ldelema` 指令将在！0是引用类型的情况下执行类型检查。Without the `readonly` prefix, the `ldelema` instruction would perform a type check in the case where !0 was a reference type. 这种类型的检查不仅低效，而且它在语义上不正确。Not only is this type check inefficient, but it is semantically incorrect. 的类型检查 `ldelema` 是完全匹配，这太强。The type check for `ldelema` is an exact match, which is too strong. 如果数组持有类型为！0的子类，则上述代码将无法通过类型检查。If the array held subclasses of type !0, the code above would fail the type check. 提取数组元素的地址，而不是元素本身，以获得 `arr[i]` 适用于值类型和引用类型的的句柄，因此可将其传递给 `constrained callvirt` 指令。The address of the array element is fetched, instead of the element itself, in order to have a handle for `arr[i]` that works for both value types and reference types, and thus can be passed to the `constrained callvirt` instruction. 通常，如果数组持有引用类型的元素，则跳过运行时检查是不安全的。In general it would be unsafe to skip the run-time check if the array held elements of a reference type. 为安全起见，需要确保不通过此指针对数组进行任何修改。To be safe, it is necessary to ensure that no modifications to the array are made through this pointer. 验证程序规则确保这一点。The verifier rules ensure this. 受限制的托管指针可以作为实例方法调用的对象进行传递，因此对于值类型而言，并不严格地说是只读的，但对于值类型，不存在任何类型安全问题。The restricted managed pointer can be passed as the object of instance method calls, so it is not strictly speaking read-only for value types, but there is no type safety problem for value types. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `readonly` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `readonly` opcode: -

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Refanytype
Public Shared ReadOnly Refanytype As OpCode

summary.span: 检索嵌入在类型化引用内的类型标记。

span.span: Retrieves the type token embedded in a typed reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1DFE 1D|refanytyperefanytype|推送在类型化引用中存储的类型标记。Pushes the type token stored in a typed reference.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 值类型引用被推送到堆栈上。A value type reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 类型化引用从堆栈中弹出，并检索其相应的类型标记。The typed reference is popped from the stack and its corresponding type token retrieved. 3. 类型标记被推送到堆栈上。The type token is pushed onto the stack. 类型化引用包含对象实例的类型标记和地址。A typed reference contains a type token and an address to an object instance. `refanytype`指令检索嵌入在类型化引用中的类型标记。The `refanytype` instruction retrieves the type token embedded in the typed reference. 有关 创建类型化引用的信息，请参阅说明。See the instruction for information on creating typed references. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `refanytype` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `refanytype` opcode: -

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Refanyval
Public Shared ReadOnly Refanyval As OpCode

summary.span: 检索嵌入在类型化引用内的地址（ 类型）。

span.span: Retrieves the address (type ) embedded in a typed reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |C2 < `T` >C2 < `T` >|refanyval `type`refanyval `type`|推送在类型化引用中存储的地址。Pushes the address stored in a typed reference.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 值类型引用被推送到堆栈上。A value type reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出类型化引用和检索到相应的地址。The typed reference is popped from the stack and the corresponding address retrieved. 3. 该地址将被推送到堆栈上。The address is pushed onto the stack. 类型化引用包含对象实例的类型标记和地址。A typed reference contains a type token and an address to an object instance. `refanyval`指令检索嵌入在类型化引用中的地址。The `refanyval` instruction retrieves the address embedded in the a typed reference. 在堆栈上提供的类型化引用中嵌入的类型必须与 `type` 或) (元数据标记指定的类型匹配 `typedef` `typeref` 。The type embedded in the typed reference supplied on the stack must match the type specified by `type` (a metadata token, either a `typedef` or a `typeref`). 请参阅 相关内容的说明。See the instruction for related content. 如果 `type` 与类型引用中存储的类型不同，则会引发 (在这种情况下， `type` 是提供给 构造) 的指令的类。 is thrown if `type` is not identical to the type stored in the type reference (in this case, `type` is the class supplied to the instruction that constructed said typed reference). 如果 `type` 找不到，则引发。 is thrown if `type` cannot be found. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `refanyval` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `refanyval` opcode: -

Public Shared ReadOnly Rem As OpCode

summary.span: 将两个值相除并将余数推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Divides two values and pushes the remainder onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5D5D|remrem|将除除以的余数 `value1` 推送 `value2` 到堆栈上。Pushes the remainder of dividing `value1` by `value2` onto the stack.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1`被推送到堆栈上。A `value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 被推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和 `value1` 将从堆栈中弹出和计算的其余部分 `value1` `div` `value2` 。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and the remainder of `value1` `div` `value2` computed. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `result` = `value1``rem` `value2` 满足下列条件：`result` = `value1` `rem` `value2` satisfies the following conditions: `result` = `value1` - `value2``×` `value1` (`div``value2`) 和：`result` = `value1` - `value2` `×` (`value1` `div` `value2`), and: 0 = | `result` | < | `value2` |、符号 (`result`) = sign () `value1` ，其中 `div` 是向零截断的除法指令。0 = | `result` | < | `value2` |, sign(`result`) = sign(`value1`), where `div` is the division instruction that truncates towards zero. 如果 `value2` 为零或 `value1` 无穷大，则结果为 NaN。If `value2` is zero or `value1` is infinity the result is NaN. 如果 `value2` 是无限的，则为 `value1`) (求反的结果 `-infinity` 。If `value2` is infinity, the result is `value1` (negated for `-infinity`). 如果为零，则引发整数运算 `value2` 。Integral operations throw if `value2` is zero. 请注意，在基于 Intel 的平台上， 当计算 (minint `rem` -1) 时，将引发。Note that on the Intel-based platforms an is thrown when computing (minint `rem` -1). 以下 方法重载可以使用 `rem` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `rem` opcode: -

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Rem_Un
Public Shared ReadOnly Rem_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 将两个无符号值相除并将余数推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Divides two unsigned values and pushes the remainder onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5E5E|remrem.un|将未签名的的剩余部分推送 `value1` `value2` 到堆栈上。Pushes the remainder of dividing unsigned `value1` by unsigned `value2` onto the stack.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 被推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 被推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和 `value1` 将从堆栈中弹出和计算的其余部分 `value1` `div` `value2` 。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and the remainder of `value1` `div` `value2` computed. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `result` = `value1``rem.un` `value2` 满足下列条件：`result` = `value1` `rem.un` `value2` satisfies the following conditions: `result` = `value1` - `value2` x (`value1` `div.un` `value2`) 和：`result` = `value1` - `value2` x(`value1` `div.un` `value2`), and: 0 = `result` < `value2` ，其中 `div.un` 是无符号除法指令。0 = `result` < `value2`, where `div.un` is the unsigned division instruction. `rem.un`指令计算 `result` 并将其推送到堆栈上。The `rem.un` instruction computes `result` and pushes it on the stack. `Rem.un` 将其参数视为无符号整数，同时将 它们视为有符号整数。`Rem.un` treats its arguments as unsigned integers, while treats them as signed integers. `Rem.un` 对于浮点数未指定。`Rem.un` is unspecified for floating-point numbers. 如果为零，则引发整数运算 `value2` 。Integral operations throw if `value2` is zero. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `rem.un` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `rem.un` opcode: -

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ret
Public Shared ReadOnly Ret As OpCode

summary.span: 从当前方法返回，并将返回值（如果存在）从被调用方的计算堆栈推送到调用方的计算堆栈上。

span.span: Returns from the current method, pushing a return value (if present) from the callee's evaluation stack onto the caller's evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2A2A|retret|从方法返回，可能返回值。Returns from method, possibly returning a value.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 从被调用方的计算堆栈中弹出返回值。The return value is popped from the callee evaluation stack. 2. 在步骤1中获取的返回值被推送到调用方计算堆栈上。The return value obtained in step 1 is pushed onto the caller evaluation stack. 如果返回值不在被调用方的计算堆栈上，则不会返回任何值 (调用方或调用方方法) 的堆栈转换行为。If the return value is not present on the callee evaluation stack, no value is returned (no stack transition behaviors for either the callee or caller method). 当前方法的返回值的类型（如果有）确定要从堆栈顶部获取的值的类型，并将其复制到调用当前方法的方法的堆栈上。The type of the return value, if any, of the current method determines the type of value to be fetched from the top of the stack and copied onto the stack of the method that called the current method. 当前方法的计算堆栈必须为空，但要返回的值除外。The evaluation stack for the current method must be empty except for the value to be returned. `ret`指令不能用于将控制传输到 `try` 、 `filter` 、 `catch` 或 `finally` 块。The `ret` instruction cannot be used to transfer control out of a`try`, `filter`, `catch`, or `finally` block. 从或中 `try` `catch` ，将 指令与 `ret` 所有封闭异常块之外的指令的目标结合使用。From within a `try` or `catch`, use the instruction with a destination of a `ret` instruction that is outside all enclosing exception blocks. 由于 `filter` 和 `finally` 块在逻辑上是异常处理的一部分，而不是嵌入其代码的方法，因此正确生成的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令不会从或中执行方法 `filter` 返回 `finally` 。Because the `filter` and `finally` blocks are logically part of exception handling and not the method in which their code is embedded, correctly generated Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions do not perform a method return from within a `filter` or `finally`. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `ret` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `ret` opcode: -

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Rethrow
Public Shared ReadOnly Rethrow As OpCode

summary.span: 再次引发当前异常。

span.span: Rethrows the current exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1AFE 1A|重新引发rethrow|重新引发当前异常Rethrows the current exception| 没有为此指令定义堆栈转换行为。No stack transition behavior is defined for this instruction. `rethrow`仅允许在处理程序的主体中使用指令 `catch` 。The `rethrow` instruction is only permitted within the body of a `catch` handler. 它将引发与此处理程序捕获的异常。It throws the same exception that was caught by this handler. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `rethrow` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `rethrow` opcode: -

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Shl
Public Shared ReadOnly Shl As OpCode

summary.span: 将整数值左移（用零填充）指定的位数，并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Shifts an integer value to the left (in zeroes) by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6262|shlshl|将整数向左移动 (以零为变化) 。Shifts an integer to the left (shifting in zeros).| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 将值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 要移动的位数将被推送到堆栈上。The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack. 3. 要移动的位数以及从堆栈中弹出的值的数目;该值将向左移动指定的位数。The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted left by the specified number of bits. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `shl`指令 `int32` `int64` `native int` 按指定的位数向左移动值 (类型或) 。The `shl` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) left by the specified number of bits. 位数为或类型的值 `int32` `native int` 。The number of bits is a value of type `int32` or `native int`. 如果要移位的位数大于或等于所提供值的位) (宽度，则返回值为未指定。The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value. `Shl` 在每个移位的最小位置插入零位。`Shl` inserts a zero bit in the lowest position on each shift. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `shl` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `shl` opcode: -

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Shr
Public Shared ReadOnly Shr As OpCode

summary.span: 将整数值右移（保留符号）指定的位数，并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Shifts an integer value (in sign) to the right by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6363|shrshr|将整数向右移位 (在 sign) 中移位。Shifts an integer to the right (shifting in sign).| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 将值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 要移动的位数将被推送到堆栈上。The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack. 3. 要移动的位数以及从堆栈中弹出的值的数目;值向右移动指定的位数。The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted right by the specified number of bits. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `shr.un`指令 `int32` `int64` `native int` 按指定的位数向右移位 (类型或) 。The `shr.un` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) right by the specified number of bits. 位数为或类型的值 `int32` `native int` 。The number of bits is a value of type `int32` or `native int`. 如果要移位的位数大于或等于所提供值的位) (宽度，则返回值为未指定。The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value. `Shr` 复制每个移位上的高序位，同时保留中原始值的符号 `result` 。`Shr` replicates the high order bit on each shift, preserving the sign of the original value in the `result`. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `shr` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `shr` opcode: -

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Shr_Un
Public Shared ReadOnly Shr_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 将无符号整数值右移（用零填充）指定的位数，并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Shifts an unsigned integer value (in zeroes) to the right by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6464|shrshr.un|将整数向右移位 (用零移位) 。Shifts an integer to the right (shifting in zeroes).| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 将值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 要移动的位数将被推送到堆栈上。The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack. 3. 要移动的位数以及从堆栈中弹出的值的数目;值向右移动指定的位数。The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted right by the specified number of bits. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. `shr.un`指令 `int32` `int64` `native int` 按指定的位数向右移位 (类型或) 。The `shr.un` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) right by the specified number of bits. 位数为或类型的值 `int32` `int64` `native int` 。The number of bits is a value of type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`. 如果要移位的位数大于或等于所提供值的位) (宽度，则返回值为未指定。The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value. `Shr.un` 在每个移位上的最高位置插入零位。`Shr.un` inserts a zero bit in the highest position on each shift. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `shr.un` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `shr.un` opcode: -

summary.span: 将提供的值类型的大小（以字节为单位）推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Pushes the size, in bytes, of a supplied value type onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1C < `T` >FE 1C < `T` >|sizeof `valType`sizeof `valType`|将值类型的大小（以字节为单位）作为推送 `unsigned int32` 。Push the size, in bytes, of a value type as an `unsigned int32`.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. ) 提供的值类型的大小 (， (`valType`) 推送到堆栈上。The size (in bytes) of the supplied value type (`valType`) is pushed onto the stack. `valType` 必须是 (或) 的元数据标记， `typeref` `typedef` 它指定值类型、引用类型或泛型类型参数。`valType` must be a metadata token (a `typeref` or `typedef`) that specifies a value type, reference type, or generic type parameter. 对于引用类型，返回的大小为相应类型的引用值的大小 (在32位) 系统上为4个字节，而不是存储在引用值引用的对象中的数据的大小。For a reference type, the size returned is the size of a reference value of the corresponding type (4 bytes on 32-bit systems), not the size of the data stored in objects referred to by the reference value. 泛型类型参数只能在定义它的类型或方法的主体中使用。A generic type parameter can be used only in the body of the type or method that defines it. 当对该类型或方法进行实例化时，泛型类型参数被替换为值类型或引用类型。When that type or method is instantiated, the generic type parameter is replaced by a value type or reference type. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `sizeof` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `sizeof` opcode: -

summary.span: 将位于计算堆栈顶部的值存储到位于指定索引的自变量槽中。

span.span: Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 0B < `unsigned int16` >FE 0B < `unsigned int16` >|starg `num`starg `num`|从堆栈中弹出顶部值并将其存储在参数槽中 `num` 。Pops the top value from the stack and stores it in argument slot `num`.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 当前位于堆栈顶部的值会弹出并置于参数槽中 `num` 。The value currently on top of the stack is popped and placed in argument slot `num`. `starg`指令从堆栈中弹出一个值，并将该值放入参数槽 `num` 。The `starg` instruction pops a value from the stack and places it in argument slot `num`. 值的类型必须与当前方法的签名中指定的参数的类型匹配。The type of the value must match the type of the argument, as specified in the current method's signature. 对于采用变量参数列表的过程， `starg` 指令只能用于初始固定参数，而不能用于签名的变量部分。For procedures that take a variable argument list, the `starg` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature. 如果将存储区的参数保留为小于4个字节的整数值，则会在从堆栈移到参数时截断值。Performing a store into arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the argument. 浮点值从其本机大小舍入 (类型 `F`) 到与参数关联的大小。Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `starg` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `starg` opcode: -

Public Shared ReadOnly Starg_S As OpCode

span.span: Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index, short form.

summary.span: 用计算堆栈中的值替换给定索引处的数组元素，其类型在指令中指定。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the value on the evaluation stack, whose type is specified in the instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |A4 < `T` >A4 < `T` >|stelem `typeTok`stelem `typeTok`|将所提供索引处的数组元素替换为堆栈上的类型值 `typeTok` 。Replaces the array element at the supplied index with a value of type `typeTok` on the stack.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 对数组的对象引用 `array` 被推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 的索引值 `index` `array` 被推送到堆栈上。An index value, `index`, to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 指令中指定的类型的值被推送到堆栈上。A value of the type specified in the instruction is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈中弹出值、索引和数组引用;将值放入给定索引处的数组元素。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem`指令用值替换一维数组中提供的从零开始的索引处的元素的值 `array` 。The `stelem` instruction replaces the value of the element at the supplied zero-based index in the one-dimensional array `array` with the value. 值具有指令中的标记所指定的类型 `typeTok` 。The value has the type specified by the token `typeTok` in the instruction. 数组是对象，因此表示为类型的值 `O` 。Arrays are objects, and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引的类型为 `native int` 。The index is type `native int`. 如果 `array` 为 null 引用，则引发。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果 `index` 为负或大于的界限，则引发 `array` 。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果不 `array` 包含所需类型的元素，则引发。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `stelem` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `stelem` opcode: -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |A0A0|stelem. r4stelem.r4|将所提供的索引处的数组元素替换为 `float32` 堆栈上的值。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `float32` value on the stack.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 对数组的对象引用 `array` 被推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 将中元素的有效索引 `array` 推送到堆栈上。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 将值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈中弹出值、索引和数组引用;将值放入给定索引处的数组元素。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem.r4`指令 `index` `array` 用 `float32` 推送到堆栈上的值替换一维数组中的元素的值。The `stelem.r4` instruction replaces the value of the element `index` in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `float32` value pushed onto the stack. 数组是对象，因此表示为类型的值 `O` 。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引的类型为 `native int` 。The index is type `native int`. 如果 `array` 为 null 引用，则引发。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果 `index` 为负或大于的界限，则引发 `array` 。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果不 `array` 包含所需类型的元素，则引发。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `stelem.r4` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `stelem.r4` opcode: -

summary.span: 用计算堆栈上的对象 ref 值（ 类型）替换给定索引处的数组元素。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the object ref value (type ) on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |A2A2|stelemstelem.ref|将所提供索引处的数组元素替换为 `ref` 堆栈上 (类型) 的值 `O` 。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `ref` value (type `O`) on the stack.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 对数组的对象引用 `array` 被推送到堆栈上。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 将中元素的有效索引 `array` 推送到堆栈上。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 将值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 从堆栈中弹出值、索引和数组引用;将值放入给定索引处的数组元素。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. 指令将在 `stelem.ref` 一维数组中提供的索引处替换元素的值，并将 `array` `ref` (类型 `O`) 值推送到堆栈上。The `stelem.ref` instruction replaces the value of the element at the supplied index in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `ref` (type `O`) value pushed onto the stack. 数组是对象，因此表示为类型的值 `O` 。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引的类型为 `native int` 。The index is type `native int`. 请注意， `stelem.ref` `array` 在为数组元素赋值之前，会将提供的值隐式转换为的元素类型。Note that `stelem.ref` implicitly casts the supplied value to the element type of `array` before assigning the value to the array element. 此强制转换可能会失败，即使对于已验证的代码也是如此。This cast can fail, even for verified code. 因此，该 `stelem.ref` 指令可能会引发 。Thus the `stelem.ref` instruction can throw . 对于不是从零开始的一维数组和多维数组， 该类提供了一个 方法。For one-dimensional arrays that aren't zero-based and for multidimensional arrays, the class provides a method. 如果 `array` 为 null 引用，则引发。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果 `index` 为负或大于的界限，则引发 `array` 。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果不 `array` 包含所需类型的元素，则引发。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `stelem.ref` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `stelem.ref` opcode: -

summary.span: 用新值替换在对象引用或指针的字段中存储的值。

span.span: Replaces the value stored in the field of an object reference or pointer with a new value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7D < `T` >7D < `T` >|stfld `field`stfld `field`|将对象的值替换为 `field` 新值。Replaces the value of `field` of the object with a new value.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 对象引用或指针被推送到堆栈上。An object reference or pointer is pushed onto the stack. 2. 将值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 3. 从堆栈中弹出值和对象引用/指针; `field` 对象中的值将替换为提供的值。The value and the object reference/pointer are popped from the stack; the value of `field` in the object is replaced with the supplied value. `stfld`指令将对象的字段值替换 (类型 `O`) 或通过指针 (类型 `native int` 、 `&` 或 `*`) 与给定的值相同。The `stfld` instruction replaces the value of a field of an object (type `O`) or via a pointer (type `native int`, `&`, or `*`) with a given value. `Field` 引用字段成员引用的元数据标记。`Field` is a metadata token that refers to a field member reference. `stfld`指令可以具有和/或的前缀 。The `stfld` instruction can have a prefix of either or both of and . 如果对象引用或指针为空引用，并且该字段不是静态的，则会引发。 is thrown if the object reference or pointer is a null reference and the field isn't static. 如果 `field` 在元数据中找不到，则引发。 is thrown if `field` is not found in the metadata. 这通常在以下情况下检查： Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码，而不是在运行时。This is typically checked when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction is converted to native code, not at runtime. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `stfld` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `stfld` opcode: -

summary.span: 在所提供的地址存储 类型的值。

span.span: Stores a value of type at a supplied address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DFDF|stind。 istind.i|`native int`将值存储在给定地址。Stores a `native int` value at a given address.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 地址被推送到堆栈上。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 将值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 3. 从堆栈中弹出值和地址;值存储在地址上。The value and the address are popped from the stack; the value is stored at the address. `stind.i`指令将值存储 `native int` 在所提供的地址 (类型 `native int` 、 `*` 或 `&`) 。The `stind.i` instruction stores a `native int` value at the supplied address (type `native int`, `*`, or `&`). 类型安全操作要求指令的 `stind.i` 使用方式与指针的类型一致。Type safe operation requires that the `stind.i` instruction be used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer. 指令的操作 `stind.i` 可以通过紧靠上 或前缀指令来更改 。The operation of the `stind.i` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 如果 `addr` 对指令后缀隐含的参数类型不进行自然对齐，则会引发。 is thrown if `addr` is not naturally aligned for the argument type implied by the instruction suffix. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `stind.i` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `stind.i` opcode: -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5151|stindstind.ref|存储对象引用 (`O` 在给定地址) 值类型。Stores an object reference (type `O`) value at a given address.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 地址被推送到堆栈上。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 将值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 3. 从堆栈中弹出值和地址;值存储在地址上。The value and the address are popped from the stack; the value is stored at the address. `stind.ref`指令将对象引用值存储在所提供的地址 (类型 `native int` 、 `*` 或 `&`) 。The `stind.ref` instruction stores an object reference value at the supplied address (type `native int`, `*`, or `&`). 类型安全操作要求指令的 `stind.ref` 使用方式与指针的类型一致。Type safe operation requires that the `stind.ref` instruction be used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer. 指令的操作 `stind.ref` 可以通过紧靠上 或前缀指令来更改 。The operation of the `stind.ref` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 如果 `addr` 对指令后缀隐含的参数类型不进行自然对齐，则会引发。 is thrown if `addr` is not naturally aligned for the argument type implied by the instruction suffix. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `stind.ref` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `stind.ref` opcode: -

summary.span: 从计算堆栈的顶部弹出当前值并将其存储到指定索引处的局部变量列表中。

span.span: Pops the current value from the top of the evaluation stack and stores it in a the local variable list at a specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 0E < `unsigned int16` >FE 0E < `unsigned int16` >|stloc `index`stloc `index`|从堆栈中弹出一个值并将其存储在局部变量中 `index` 。Pops a value from the stack and stores it in local variable `index`.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 从堆栈中弹出一个值并将其放入本地变量中 `index` 。A value is popped off of the stack and placed in local variable `index`. `stloc`指令从计算堆栈中弹出顶部值并将其移动到局部变量号 `index` ，其中局部变量从0开始编号。The `stloc` instruction pops the top value off the evaluation stack and moves it into local variable number `index`, where local variables are numbered 0 onwards. 值的类型必须与当前方法本地签名中指定的局部变量的类型匹配。The type of the value must match the type of the local variable as specified in the current method's local signature. 如果存储在保持小于4个字节的整数值的局部变量中，长时间将在从堆栈移到局部变量时截断值。Storing into locals that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the local variable. 浮点值从其本机大小舍入 (类型 `F`) 到与参数关联的大小。Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument. 更正 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令需要 `index` 为有效的本地索引。Correct Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions require that `index` be a valid local index. 对于 `stloc` 指令， `index` 必须在0到65534的范围内（含） (具体说来，65535不是有效) 。For the `stloc` instruction, `index` must lie in the range 0 to 65534 inclusive (specifically, 65535 is not valid). 排除65535的原因是实际的：可能的实现将使用2字节整数跟踪本地的索引，以及给定方法的局部变量总数。The reason for excluding 65535 is pragmatic: likely implementations will use a 2-byte integer to track both a local's index, as well as the total number of locals for a given method. 如果已将65535的索引设为有效，则需要更宽的整数来跟踪此类方法中的局部变量的数目。If an index of 65535 had been made valid, it would require a wider integer to track the number of locals in such a method. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `stloc` 操作码：The following method overloads can use the `stloc` opcode: - -

summary.span: 将指定类型的值从计算堆栈复制到所提供的内存地址中。

span.span: Copies a value of a specified type from the evaluation stack into a supplied memory address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |81 < `T` >81 < `T` >|stobj `class`stobj `class`|将类型的值存储在 `class` 内存中。Stores a value of type `class` from the stack into memory.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 地址被推送到堆栈上。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 类型的值类型对象 `class` 被推送到堆栈上。A value type object of type `class` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 从堆栈中弹出对象和地址;值类型对象存储在地址上。The object and the address are popped from the stack; the value type object is stored at the address. `stobj`指令将值类型对象复制到地址指定的地址 (类型为 `native int` 、 `*` 或) 的指针 `&` 。The `stobj` instruction copies the value type object into the address specified by the address (a pointer of type `native int`, `*`, or `&`). 已复制的字节数取决于由表示的类的大小 `class` ，即表示值类型的元数据标记。The number of bytes copied depends on the size of the class represented by `class`, a metadata token representing a value type. 指令的操作 `stobj` 可以通过紧靠上 或前缀指令来更改 。The operation of the `stobj` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 如果找不到类，则会引发。 is thrown if class cannot be found. 当 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码而不是运行时，通常会检测到此情况。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at run time. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `stobj` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `stobj` opcode: -

summary.span: 从其他值中减去一个值并将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Subtracts one value from another and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5959|subsub|从一个值中减去另一个值，返回新的数值。Subtracts one value from another, returning a new numeric value.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 被推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 被推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2``value1`从堆栈中弹出和，并 `value2` 从中减去 `value1` 。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value2` is subtracted from `value1`. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. 未检测到 (进行适当溢出处理的整数运算溢出，请参阅 ) 。Overflow is not detected for integer operations (for proper overflow handling, see ). 整数减法环绕，而不是尽量充满。Integer subtraction wraps, rather than saturates. 例如：假设8位整数，其中 `value1` 设置为0，且 `value2` 设置为1，则 "已包装" 结果将为255。For example: assuming 8-bit integers, where `value1` is set to 0 and `value2` is set to 1, the "wrapped" result will be 255. 浮点溢出 `+inf` `PositiveInfinity`) 或 () 返回 (`-inf` `NegativeInfinity` 。Floating-point overflow returns `+inf` (`PositiveInfinity`) or `-inf` (`NegativeInfinity`). 以下 方法重载可以使用 `sub` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `sub` opcode: -

span.span: Subtracts one integer value from another, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |特里斯坦DA|ovfsub.ovf|使用溢出检查从一个整数值中减去另一个整数值。Subtracts one integer value from another with an overflow check.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 被推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 被推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和 `value1` 将从堆栈中弹出; `value2` 从中减去并 `value1` 检查溢出。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value2` is subtracted from `value1` with a check for overflow. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. 如果结果不能用结果类型表示，则会引发。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 此操作在有符号整数上执行;对于浮点值，请使用 。This operation is performed on signed integers; for floating-point values, use . 以下 方法重载可以使用 `sub.ovf` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `sub.ovf` opcode: -

summary.span: 从另一值中减去一个无符号整数值，执行溢出检查，并且将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Subtracts one unsigned integer value from another, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DBDB|ovfsub.ovf.un|使用溢出检查从一个无符号整数值减去另一个无符号整数值。Subtracts one unsigned integer value from another with an overflow check.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 被推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 被推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和 `value1` 将从堆栈中弹出; `value2` 从中减去并 `value1` 检查溢出。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value2` is subtracted from `value1` with a check for overflow. 4. 将结果推送到堆栈上。The result is pushed onto the stack. 如果结果不能用结果类型表示，则会引发。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 此操作在有符号整数上执行;对于浮点值，请使用 。This operation is performed on signed integers; for floating-point values, use . 以下 方法重载可以使用 `sub.ovf.un` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `sub.ovf.un` opcode: -

Public Shared ReadOnly Switch As OpCode

summary.span: 实现跳转表。

span.span: Implements a jump table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |45 < `unsigned int32` > < `int32` > ... < `int32` >45 < `unsigned int32` > < `int32` >... < `int32` >|switch (`N` ， `t1` ， `t2` ... `tN`) switch (`N`, `t1`, `t2`... `tN`)|跳转到其中一个 `N` 值。Jumps to one of `N` values.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 将值推送到堆栈上。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 该值将从堆栈中弹出，并按照值索引的偏移量（其中值小于）将执行传输到指令 `N` 。The value is popped off the stack and execution is transferred to the instruction at the offset indexed by the value, where the value is less than `N`. `switch`指令实现跳转表。The `switch` instruction implements a jump table. 指令的格式 `unsigned int32` 表示目标的数量 `N` ，后跟 `N` 指定跳转目标的 int32 值。The format of the instruction is an `unsigned int32` representing the number of targets `N`, followed by `N` int32 values specifying jump targets. 这些目标表示为从该指令后面的指令开头 (正或负) 的偏移量 `switch` 。These targets are represented as offsets (positive or negative) from the beginning of the instruction following this `switch` instruction. `switch`指令从堆栈中弹出一个值，并将其作为无符号整数与进行比较 `N` 。The `switch` instruction pops a value off the stack and compares it, as an unsigned integer, to `N`. 如果值小于 `N` ，执行将传输到按值索引的目标，其中目标从0开始编号 (例如，0值表示第一个目标，值为1，则使用第二个目标，依此类推) 。If value is less than `N`, execution is transferred to the target indexed by value, where targets are numbered from 0 (for example, a value of 0 takes the first target, a value of 1 takes the second target, and so on). 如果该值大于或等于 `N` ，则继续执行下一条指令 (贯穿) 。If the value is greater than or equal to `N`, execution continues at the next instruction (fall through). 如果目标指令具有一个或多个前缀代码，则只能将控制转移到其中的第一个前缀。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. `try` `catch` `filter` 此指令无法执行控制传入和传出、、和块的控制 `finally` 。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. (这种传输会受到严格限制，因此必须) 使用保留指令。(Such transfers are severely restricted and must use the leave instruction instead). 下面的 方法重载可以使用 `switch` 操作码。The following method overload can use the `switch` opcode. `Label[]`参数是表示32位偏移量的标签数组。The `Label[]` argument is an array of Labels representing 32-bit offsets. - ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了 `Switch` 如何使用操作码来使用数组生成跳转表 。The following code sample illustrates the use of the `Switch` opcode to generate a jump table using an array of . [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 执行后缀的方法调用指令，以便在执行实际调用指令前移除当前方法的堆栈帧。

span.span: Performs a postfixed method call instruction such that the current method's stack frame is removed before the actual call instruction is executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 14FE 14|侧.tail.|后续调用终止当前方法Subsequent call terminates current methods| 没有为此指令定义堆栈转换行为。There is no stack transition behavior defined for this instruction. `tail`前缀指令必须紧跟在 、 或 指令之前。The `tail` prefix instruction must immediately precede a , , or instruction. 它指示在执行调用指令之前应移除当前方法的堆栈帧。It indicates that the current method's stack frame should be removed before the call instruction is executed. 它还意味着从以下调用返回的值也是当前方法返回的值，因此可以将调用转换为交叉方法跳转。It also implies that the value returned from the following call is also the value returned by the current method, and the call can therefore be converted into a cross-method jump. 堆栈必须为空，但通过以下调用传输的参数除外。The stack must be empty except for the arguments being transferred by the following call. 调用指令后面的指令必须是 ret。因此，唯一有效的代码序列是 `tail. call` (`calli` 或 `callvirt`) 。The instruction following the call instruction must be a ret. Thus the only valid code sequence is `tail. call` (or `calli` or `callvirt`). 更正 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令不能分支到 `call` 指令，但它们可能会分支到后面的 。Correct Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions must not branch to the `call` instruction, but they may branch to the subsequent . 如果控件从不受信任的代码传输到受信任的代码，则无法放弃当前帧，因为这会危及代码标识安全性。The current frame cannot be discarded when control is transferred from untrusted code to trusted code, since this would jeopardize code identity security. 因此，.NET Framework 安全检查可能会导致 `tail` 忽略，而保留标准 说明。The .NET Framework security checks can therefore cause the `tail` to be ignored, leaving a standard instruction. 同样，若要允许在调用返回后退出已同步的区域，则在 `tail` 用于退出标记为已同步的方法时将忽略该前缀。Similarly, in order to allow the exit of a synchronized region to occur after the call returns, the `tail` prefix is ignored when used to exit a method that is marked synchronized. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `tail` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `tail` opcode: -

span.span: Returns true or false if the supplied opcode takes a single byte argument.
or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于查找要在优化代码中使用的 MSIL 操作码为 "短格式"。This method can be used to find which MSIL opcodes are "short form", for use in optimized code. `TakesSingleByteArgument``true`如果 实例在以下情况下采用单个字节参数，则返回：`TakesSingleByteArgument` returns `true` if the instance takes a single byte argument in the following cases: - 操作码执行到字节大小的地址的分支指令 (例如， 和 ) 。The opcode performs a branch instruction to a byte-sized address (for example, and ). - 操作码将一个字节值推送到堆栈 (例如 ) 。The opcode pushes a byte value onto the stack (for example, ). - 操作码通过字节大小的 "缩写" (（例如）和) 来引用变量或参数 。The opcode references a variable or argument via the byte-sized "short form" (for example, and ). 否则，将返回 `false`。Otherwise, it returns `false`. 下面的示例演示了 `TakesSingleByteArgument` 如何通过反射到 `OpCodes` 类并进行测试来查看每个字段是否 `OpCode` 采用单字节参数。The example below demonstrates the use of `TakesSingleByteArgument` by reflecting on to the `OpCodes` class and testing to see whether each `OpCode` field takes a single-byte argument. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.TakesSingleByteArgument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.TakesSingleByteArgument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.TakesSingleByteArgument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.TakesSingleByteArgument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.TakesSingleByteArgument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.TakesSingleByteArgument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 引发当前位于计算堆栈上的异常对象。

span.span: Throws the exception object currently on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7A7A|throwthrow|引发异常。Throws an exception.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 向堆栈推送 (到异常) 的对象引用。An object reference (to an exception) is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出对象引用并引发异常。The object reference is popped from the stack and the exception thrown. `throw`指令引发 (类型 `O`) 当前堆栈上的异常对象。The `throw` instruction throws the exception object (type `O`) currently on the stack. 如果对象引用为空引用，则引发。 is thrown if the object reference is a null reference. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `throw` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `throw` opcode: -

summary.span: 指示当前位于计算堆栈上的地址可能没有与紧接的 、、、、、、 或 指令的自然大小对齐。

span.span: Indicates that an address currently atop the evaluation stack might not be aligned to the natural size of the immediately following , , , , , , , or instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 12 < `unsigned int8` >FE 12 < `unsigned int8` >|未对齐.unaligned. `alignment`|指示后面的指针指令可能是不对齐的。Indicates that the subsequent pointer instruction may be unaligned.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 地址被推送到堆栈上。An address is pushed onto the stack. `Unaligned` 指定 (非托管指针的地址， `native int` 堆栈上的) 可能不会与紧跟其后 `ldind` 、、、、、、 `stind` `ldfld` `stfld` `ldobj` `stobj` `initblk` 或 `cpblk` 指令的自然大小对齐。`Unaligned` specifies that the address (an unmanaged pointer, `native int`) on the stack might not be aligned to the natural size of the immediately following `ldind`, `stind`, `ldfld`, `stfld`, `ldobj`, `stobj`, `initblk`, or `cpblk` instruction. 也就是说，对于说明， 地址的对齐方式可能不会为4字节边界。That is, for a instruction the alignment of the address may not be to a 4-byte boundary. 对于 `initblk` 和， `cpblk` 默认对齐方式为 "体系结构依赖 (4 个字节，32位 cpu，64位 cpu 上的8字节") 。For `initblk` and `cpblk` the default alignment is architecture dependent (4-byte on 32-bit CPUs, 8-byte on 64-bit CPUs). `unaligned`如果在编译时不知道对齐方式为8字节，则不会将其输出限制为32位 word 的代码生成器必须使用。Code generators that do not restrict their output to a 32-bit word size must use `unaligned` if the alignment is not known at compile time to be 8-byte. "对齐" 的值必须是1、2或4，这意味着生成的代码应分别假定地址是字节、双字节或4字节对齐。The value of alignment must be 1, 2, or 4 and means that the generated code should assume that the address is byte, double-byte, or quad-byte aligned, respectively. 请注意， (类型 `*`) 的暂时性指针始终对齐。Note that transient pointers (type `*`) are always aligned. 尽管指令的对齐在 `cpblk` 逻辑上需要两个数字 (一个用于源，另一个用于目标) ，因此，如果仅指定较小的数字，则不会对性能产生显著影响。While the alignment for a `cpblk` instruction would logically require two numbers (one for the source and one for the destination), there is no noticeable impact on performance if only the lower number is specified. `unaligned`和 `volatile` 前缀可以按任意顺序进行组合。The `unaligned` and `volatile` prefixes can be combined in either order. 它们必须紧跟在、、、、、、 `ldind` `stind` `ldfld` `stfld` `ldobj` `stobj` `initblk` 或指令之前 `cpblk` 。They must immediately precede a `ldind`, `stind`, `ldfld`, `stfld`, `ldobj`, `stobj`, `initblk`, or `cpblk` instruction. 和说明只允许使用前缀 。Only the prefix is allowed for the and instructions. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `unaligned` 操作码：The following method overloads can use the `unaligned` opcode: - -

summary.span: 将值类型的已装箱的表示形式转换为其未装箱的形式。

span.span: Converts the boxed representation of a value type to its unboxed form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |79 < `T` >79 < `T` >|装箱 `valType`unbox `valType`|从其装箱表示形式中提取值类型数据 `obj` 。Extracts the value type data from `obj`, its boxed representation.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 对象引用被推送到堆栈上。An object reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出对象引用，并取消装箱到值类型指针。The object reference is popped from the stack and unboxed to a value type pointer. 3. 值类型指针被推送到堆栈上。The value type pointer is pushed onto the stack. 在公共语言基础结构中，值类型具有两个不同的表示形式 (CLI) ：A value type has two separate representations within the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI): - 当值类型嵌入到另一个对象中时使用的 "原始" 窗体。A 'raw' form used when a value type is embedded within another object. - "装箱" 的窗体，其中值类型中的数据将 (装箱) 包装到对象中，因此它可以作为独立实体存在。A 'boxed' form, where the data in the value type is wrapped (boxed) into an object so it can exist as an independent entity. `unbox`指令将对象引用转换 (类型 `O`) ，将值类型的装箱表示形式转换为 (托管指针的值类型指针，键入 `&`) ，其未装箱的形式。The `unbox` instruction converts the object reference (type `O`), the boxed representation of a value type, to a value type pointer (a managed pointer, type `&`), its unboxed form. 提供的值类型 (`valType`) 是一种元数据标记，用于指示装箱对象中包含的值类型类型。The supplied value type (`valType`) is a metadata token indicating the type of value type contained within the boxed object. 与 （需要创建值类型的副本以便在对象中使用） `unbox` 不需要从对象复制值类型。Unlike , which is required to make a copy of a value type for use in the object, `unbox` is not required to copy the value type from the object. 通常，它只是计算装箱对象内已存在的值类型的地址。Typically it simply computes the address of the value type that is already present inside of the boxed object. 如果对象未装箱为，则会引发 `valType` 。 is thrown if the object is not boxed as `valType`. 如果对象引用为空引用，则引发。 is thrown if the object reference is a null reference. 如果找不到值类型，则会引发 `valType` 。 is thrown if the value type `valType` cannot be found. 当 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令转换为本机代码而不是运行时，通常会检测到此情况。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, rather than at runtime. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `unbox` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `unbox` opcode: -

Public Shared ReadOnly Unbox_Any As OpCode

summary.span: 将指令中指定类型的已装箱的表示形式转换成未装箱形式。

span.span: Converts the boxed representation of a type specified in the instruction to its unboxed form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |A5 < `T` >A5 < `T` >|取消装箱。 `typeTok`unbox.any `typeTok`|从中提取数据 `obj` ，其装箱表示形式。Extract the data from `obj`, its boxed representation.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 对象引用 `obj` 被推送到堆栈上。An object reference `obj` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 从堆栈中弹出对象引用，并取消装箱到指令中指定的类型。The object reference is popped from the stack and unboxed to the type specified in the instruction. 3. 生成的对象引用或值类型被推送到堆栈上。The resulting object reference or value type is pushed onto the stack. 当应用于值类型的装箱形式时， `unbox.any` 指令提取类型) (中包含的值 `obj` `O` ，因此等效于 `unbox` 后跟 `ldobj` 。When applied to the boxed form of a value type, the `unbox.any` instruction extracts the value contained within `obj` (of type `O`), and is therefore equivalent to `unbox` followed by `ldobj`. 当应用于引用类型时， `unbox.any` 指令与具有相同的效果 `castclass` `typeTok` 。When applied to a reference type, the `unbox.any` instruction has the same effect as `castclass` `typeTok`. 如果操作数 `typeTok` 是泛型类型参数，则运行时行为取决于为该泛型类型参数指定的类型。If the operand `typeTok` is a generic type parameter, then the runtime behavior is determined by the type that is specified for that generic type parameter. 如果不是装箱类型，则会引发 `obj` 。 is thrown if `obj` is not a boxed type. 如果 `obj` 为 null 引用，则引发。 is thrown if `obj` is a null reference. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `unbox.any` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `unbox.any` opcode: -

summary.span: 指定当前位于计算堆栈顶部的地址可以是易失的，并且读取该位置的结果不能被缓存，或者对该地址的多个存储区不能被取消。

span.span: Specifies that an address currently atop the evaluation stack might be volatile, and the results of reading that location cannot be cached or that multiple stores to that location cannot be suppressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 13FE 13|失效.volatile.|指示后续指针引用是可变的。Indicates that the subsequent pointer reference is volatile.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 地址被推送到堆栈上。An address is pushed onto the stack. `volatile`.`volatile`. 指定该地址是一个易失性地址 (也就是说，它可从外部引用到当前的执行线程) 并且无法缓存读取该位置的结果，或者无法禁止多个存储到该位置。specifies that the address is a volatile address (that is, it can be referenced externally to the current thread of execution) and the results of reading that location cannot be cached or that multiple stores to that location cannot be suppressed. 将访问标记为 `volatile` 只影响单一访问权限; 对同一位置的其他访问必须单独标记。Marking an access as `volatile` affects only that single access; other accesses to the same location must be marked separately. 不需要以原子方式执行对可变位置的访问。Access to volatile locations need not be performed atomically. 和 `volatile` 前缀可以按任意顺序进行组合。The and `volatile` prefixes can be combined in either order. 它们必须紧跟在、、、、、、 `ldind` `stind` `ldfld` `stfld` `ldobj` `stobj` `initblk` 或指令之前 `cpblk` 。They must immediately precede a `ldind`, `stind`, `ldfld`, `stfld`, `ldobj`, `stobj`, `initblk`, or `cpblk` instruction. `volatile`和说明只允许使用前缀 。Only the `volatile` prefix is allowed for the and instructions. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `volatile` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `volatile` opcode: -

summary.span: 计算位于计算堆栈顶部的两个值的按位异或，并且将结果推送到计算堆栈上。

span.span: Computes the bitwise XOR of the top two values on the evaluation stack, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了指令的十六进制和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 程序集格式，以及简短的参考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|程序集格式Assembly Format|说明Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6161|xorxor|计算两个整数值的按位 XOR 并返回整数。Computes the bitwise XOR of two integer values and returns an integer.| 堆栈转换行为顺序如下：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 被推送到堆栈上。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 被推送到堆栈上。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2``value1`从堆栈中弹出和，并计算按位 XOR。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and their bitwise XOR computed. 4. 和的按位 `value2` XOR `value1` 被推送到堆栈上。The bitwise XOR of `value2` and `value1` is pushed onto the stack. `xor`指令计算堆栈顶部两个值的按位 XOR，并将结果保留在堆栈上。The `xor` instruction computes the bitwise XOR of the top two values on the stack and leaves the result on the stack. `Xor` 是特定于整数的操作。`Xor` is an integer-specific operation. 以下 方法重载可以使用 `xor` 操作码：The following method overload can use the `xor` opcode: -
